author: realjosiah
title: Thrift Mobile Wallet
description: Lack of a wallet oriented to savings and financial health through DeFi, focused on developing countries. THRIFT token.
solution: Develop user-friendly financial intelligence mobile wallet to drive Cardano adoption through savings & open decentralized finance.
experience: Our Team has a combined experience of 35 years in blockchain, finance, machine learning, business analytics, African business & big data.
